items.sentence: I think that I\'ll buy this bracelet for Mary.
I think that I\'m going to ask Tom to do that.
Tom drank the whole bottle of wine by himself.
Tom found a hundred dollar bill on the street.
Tom, how old were you when you left Australia?
Unfortunately, Tom let the cat out of the bag.
Unfortunately, the ambulance arrived too late.
Was Tom able to do everything he wanted to do?
She\'ll tell him about it when she comes back.
She walked past him without even noticing him.
